content: Bank Account DBS Asked by AnonymousAsked 4w agoWhat are the differences between DBS Visa Debit Card and DBS NUSSU Debit Card in terms of privileges?Read both on DBS website and they looked very similar in having 3% cashback.1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

AmkaesLevel 2. RookieAnswered 4w agoHello! There actually isn't much difference except that the NUSSU card charges an annual fee of $10 after 4 years. A live chat officer told me that NUS students sometimes would choose the NUSSU card cos the design is nicer and have the NUS logo HAHA. Novelty sake, I guess!0 comments1
